sourcesContent: import { Box, Flex, Heading, Text } from '@chakra-ui/core'; import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Logo from '../../../../components/Logo'; import { AuthLayoutContainer } from './AuthLayout.style'; export interface AuthLayoutProps { heading?: string; subheading?: string; children: React.ReactNode; footing?: React.ReactNode; } export function AuthLayout({ heading, subheading, children, footing }: AuthLayoutProps) { return ( {heading} {subheading} {children} {footing} © Simpu Privacy & Terms Contact Us ); }
